topic.domains: (topic abbrev-d) a(props deliveryTarget) (topic equation-d) (topic hazard-d) (topic hi-d) (topic indexing-d) (topic markup-d) (topic mathml-d) (topic pr-d) (topic relmgmt-d) (topic sw-d) (topic svg-d) (topic ui-d) (topic ut-d) (topic markup-d xml-d)
topic.title: Allergy Observation2 - conformance rules

section.p: This template reflects a discrete observation about a patient's allergy or intolerance. Because it is a discrete observation, it will have a statusCode of "completed". The effectiveTime, also referred to as the "biologically relevant time" is the time at which the observation holds for the patient. For a provider seeing a patient in the clinic today, observing a history of penicillin allergy that developed five years ago, the effectiveTime is five years ago. The effectiveTime of the Allergy - Intolerance Observation is the definitive indication of whether or not the underlying allergy/intolerance is resolved. If known to be resolved, then an effectiveTime/high would be present. If the date of resolution is not known, then effectiveTime/high will be present with a nullFlavor of "UNK". The agent responsible for an allergy or adverse reaction is not always a manufactured material (for example, food allergies), nor is it necessarily consumed. The following constraints reflect limitations in the base CDA R2 specification, and should be used to represent any type of responsible agent, i.e., use playingEntity classCode = "MMAT" for all agents, manufactured or not.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7381, CONF:1098-10488, CONF:1098-32526 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.7"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Allergy Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.7)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:1098-31526)
Note: Use negationInd="true" to indicate that the allergy was not observed.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15947)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1098-15948, CONF:1098-32153)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Allergy/Adverse Event Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.6.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7390)
Note: The consumable participant points to the precise allergen or substance of intolerance. Because the consumable and the reaction are more clinically relevant than a categorization of the allergy/adverse event type, many systems will simply assign a fixed value here (e.g. "allergy to substance").
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-19084)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-19085)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-7387)
Note: If the allergy/intolerance is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known, then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'.

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31143)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHOULD contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7447, CONF:1098-7907, CONF:1098-15955)
Contains @typeCode="MFST" MFST
Conforms to Reaction Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9:2014-06-09)

SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-9961, CONF:1098-9962, CONF:1098-15956, DSTU:710)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Severity Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.8:2014-06-09)

contains [0..*] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Allergy Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.28)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant such that it (CONF:1098-7402)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode/@code="CSM" Consumable (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 HL7ParticipationType) (CONF:7403, R2.0=CONF:1098-7403)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1098-7404)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode/@code="MANU" Manufactured Product (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.110 HL7RoleClass) (CONF:7405, R2.0=CONF:1098-7405)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1098-7406)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MMAT" (CONF:7407, R2.0=CONF:7407)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-7419)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32910, CONF:1098-32911, CONF:1098-32913)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Criticality Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.145)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
entryRelationship with target entry Reaction Observation (V2) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7449)
entryRelationship with target entry Severity Observation (V2) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-9964, DSTU:710)
entryRelationship with target entry Criticality Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-32912)
SHALL conform to Substance Or Device Allergy Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.24.3.90)
SHALL conform to Allergy Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.7)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7379, R2.0=CONF:1098-7379)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7380, R2.0=CONF:1098-7380)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:1098-31526)
Note: Use negationInd="true" to indicate that the allergy was not observed.
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7382, R2.0=CONF:1098-7382)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15947)/@code="ASSERTION" Assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1098-15948, CONF:1098-32153)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-19084)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-19085)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-7387)
Note: If the allergy/intolerance is known to be resolved, but the date of resolution is not known, then the high element SHALL be present, and the nullFlavor attribute SHALL be set to 'UNK'.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Allergy/Adverse Event Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.6.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-7390)
Note: The consumable participant points to the precise allergen or substance of intolerance. Because the consumable and the reaction are more clinically relevant than a categorization of the allergy/adverse event type, many systems will simply assign a fixed value here (e.g. "allergy to substance").

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:16333, CONF:16335, CONF:16336, R2.0=CONF:1098-16333, R2.0=CONF:1098-16335, R2.0=CONF:1098-16336)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Allergy Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.28)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:16318)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="CSM" (CONF:16319, R2.0=CONF:1098-16319)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:16320)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MANU" (CONF:16321, R2.0=CONF:1098-16321)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:16322)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MMAT" (CONF:16323, R2.0=CONF:1098-16323)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:16324)
code/originalText/reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1 (CONF:16329)
In an allergy to a specific medication the code SHALL be selected from the ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.16 Medication Brand Name DYNAMIC or the ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.17 Medication Clinical Drug DYNAMIC (CONF:16325)
In an allergy to a class of medications the code SHALL be selected from the ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.18 Medication Drug Class DYNAMIC (CONF:16331)
In an allergy to a food or other substance the code SHALL be selected from the ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.20 Ingredient Name DYNAMIC (CONF:16332)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:16328)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:16327)
code MAY be selected from ValueSet Substance-Reactant for Intolerance 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.1 DYNAMIC. Note: Value set intentionally defined as a GROUPING made up of: Value Set: Medication Drug Class (2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.18) (NDFRT drug class codes); Value Set: Clinical Drug Ingredient (2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.7) (RxNORM ingredient codes); Value Set: Unique Ingredient Identifier - Complete Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.20) (UNII ingredient codes); Value Set: Substance Other Than Clinical Drug (2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.9) (SNOMED CT substance codes). (CONF:16324, R2.0=CONF:1098-16324)

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7440, CONF:7906, CONF:15954)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Allergy Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.28)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31143)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHOULD contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7447, CONF:1098-7907, CONF:1098-15955)
Contains @typeCode="MFST" MFST
Conforms to Reaction Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9:2014-06-09)

SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-9961, CONF:1098-9962, CONF:1098-15956, DSTU:710)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Severity Observation2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.8:2014-06-09)

contains [0..*] entryRelationship such that it
Conforms to Allergy Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.28)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant such that it (CONF:1098-7402)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode/@code="CSM" Consumable (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 HL7ParticipationType) (CONF:7403, R2.0=CONF:1098-7403)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1098-7404)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode/@code="MANU" Manufactured Product (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.110 HL7RoleClass) (CONF:7405, R2.0=CONF:1098-7405)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1098-7406)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MMAT" (CONF:7407, R2.0=CONF:7407)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-7419)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

SHOULD contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32910, CONF:1098-32911, CONF:1098-32913)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Criticality Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.145)
entryRelationship with target entry Allergy Status Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:16334, R2.0=CONF:1098-16334)
entryRelationship with target entry Reaction Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:16338)
entryRelationship with target entry Severity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:16343)
If it is unknown when the allergy began, this effectiveTime SHALL contain low/@nullFLavor="UNK" (CONF:9103)
If the allergy is no longer a concern, this effectiveTime MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:10082)
value SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:7422)
originalText, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15949)
reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:15950)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (CONF:15951)
entryRelationship with target entry AllergyStatusObservation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7446)
entryRelationship with target entry Reaction Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7449)
entryRelationship with target entry Severity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:9964)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
entryRelationship with target entry Reaction Observation (V2) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7449)
entryRelationship with target entry Severity Observation (V2) SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-9964, DSTU:710)
entryRelationship with target entry Criticality Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-32912)

displayName="Instructions Medication"/> </substanceAdministration> </entryRelationship> <precondition typeCode="PRCN"/> </substanceAdministration> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.8" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.8"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="227514909"/> value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="506628431"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </observation>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7381, CONF:10488 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.7"
Consol Allergy Observation If it is unknown when the allergy began, this effectiveTime SHALL contain low/@nullFLavor="UNK" (CONF:9103)
Consol Allergy Observation If the allergy is no longer a concern, this effectiveTime MAY contain zero or one [0..1] high (CONF:10082)
Consol Allergy Observation value SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:7422)
Consol Allergy Observation originalText, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:15949)
Consol Allergy Observation reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:15950)
Consol Allergy Observation reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (CONF:15951)
Consol Allergy Observation entryRelationship with target entry AllergyStatusObservation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7446)
Consol Allergy Observation entryRelationship with target entry Reaction Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7449)
Consol Allergy Observation entryRelationship with target entry Severity Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:9964)
SHALL conform to Substance Or Device Allergy Observation template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.24.3.90)
Consol Allergy Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7379, R2.0=CONF:1098-7379)
Consol Allergy Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7380, R2.0=CONF:1098-7380)
Consol Allergy Observation SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7382, R2.0=CONF:1098-7382)
Consol Allergy Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15947)/@code="ASSERTION" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:15948)
Consol Allergy Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7386)
Consol Allergy Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7387)

Consol Allergy Observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Allergy/Adverse Event Type 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.6.2 DYNAMIC (CONF:7390, CONF:9139)

Consol Allergy Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7440, CONF:7906, CONF:15954) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Allergy Status Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.28)

Consol Allergy Observation SHOULD contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:7447, CONF:7907, CONF:15955) Contains @typeCode="MFST" MFST, and Conforms to Reaction Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.9)

Consol Allergy Observation MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:9961, CONF:9962, CONF:15956) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Severity Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.8)
Consol Allergy Observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] participant, where its type is Participant (CONF:7402)
SHALL conform to CDA Participant2
Consol Participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode/@code="CSM" Consumable (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.90 HL7ParticipationType) (CONF:7403, R2.0=CONF:1098-7403)
Consol Participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole, where its type is Participant Role (CONF:7404)
SHALL conform to CDA Participant Role
Consol Participant Role SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode/@code="MANU" Manufactured Product (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.110 HL7RoleClass) (CONF:7405, R2.0=CONF:1098-7405)
Consol Participant Role SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] playingEntity, where its type is Playing Entity (CONF:7406)
Consol Playing Entity reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1 (CONF:15953)

Consol Playing Entity In an allergy to a specific medication the code SHALL be selected from the ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.16 Medication Brand Name DYNAMIC or the ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.17 Medication Clinical Drug DYNAMIC (CONF:7421)
Consol Playing Entity In an allergy to a class of medications the code SHALL be selected from the ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.18 Medication Drug Class DYNAMIC (CONF:10083)
Consol Playing Entity In an allergy to a food or other substance the code SHALL be selected from the ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.20 Ingredient Name DYNAMIC (CONF:10084)
Consol Playing Entity reference, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @value (CONF:15952)
Consol Playing Entity originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference (CONF:7425)

Consol Playing Entity code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Substance-Reactant for Intolerance 2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.1 DYNAMIC. Note: Value set intentionally defined as a GROUPING made up of: Value Set: Medication Drug Class (2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.18) (NDFRT drug class codes); Value Set: Clinical Drug Ingredient (2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.7) (RxNORM ingredient codes); Value Set: Unique Ingredient Identifier - Complete Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.20) (UNII ingredient codes); Value Set: Substance Other Than Clinical Drug (2.16.840.1.113762.1.4.1010.9) (SNOMED CT substance codes). (CONF:7419)
SHALL conform to CDA Playing Entity
Consol Playing Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="MMAT" (CONF:7407, R2.0=CONF:7407)
Consol Playing Entity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:7419)
Extends CE
Consol CE SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:7424)
Consol CE MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:7431)
